name: EvoSal - The D
author: EvoSal
notes: I was able to hit kog with my DW deck. I had many opportunities to rank up with multiple deck types (Sylvans, CA, Aliens, and DWs) but I like to stay in legend for most of the month for more competitive play. I had two DW decks that I used one with archfiends and this one I used with trunade. The trunade build was more fun since it was easier to get an OTK. , I also switched between the necro fear and broww a few times but ultimately decided on the necro fear build
